people_also_ask.question: Is Metroid Prime difficult?
people_also_ask.heading: Metroid Prime is the first game to feature adjustable difficulty levels worldwide. ... Hypermode is the same as the original Hard Mode, while Veteran is comparable to the Normal Mode of the original games, and an even easier Normal Mode is added.
people_also_ask.title: Difficulty mode | Wikitroid

people_also_ask.question: Can you play Metroid Prime on switch?
people_also_ask.heading: Nintendo insider says Metroid Prime is finally coming to Switch, but not the way you're hoping. ... It's claimed that the original 2002 Metroid Prime game may be getting a re-release to the console all on its own, without its sequels included.23-Sep-2021
people_also_ask.title: Nintendo insider says Metroid Prime is finally coming to ... - T3

people_also_ask.question: Did Metroid Prime sell well?
people_also_ask.heading: Metroid Prime became one of the best-selling games on the GameCube. It was the second best-selling game of November 2002 in North America, behind Grand Theft Auto: Vice City; 250,000 units were sold in the first week of its release.
people_also_ask.title: Metroid Prime - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.question: Is Metroid Prime for kids?
people_also_ask.heading: Overall, this game is appropriate for kids, so long as they enjoy figuring out where to go and what to do in a large gaming universe! This subsect of the franchise is stylistically contrarian to the majority of the series, as the Metroid Prime games are first-person shooters (FPS) instead of side-scrolling games.22-Oct-2021
people_also_ask.title: Are Metroid Games OK for Kids? | SuperParent

knowledge_panel.description: metroid prime is an action-adventure game developed by retro studios and published by nintendo for the gamecube. metroid prime is the fourth main installment in the metroid franchise and the first game in the series to use 3d computer graphics and a first-person perspective. wikipedia
